body: Is there any update on what is going to happen regarding the EULA?
body_tagged: Is there any update on what is going to happen regarding the EULA?
title: Update

replies.body: Not yet, but it will be announced on the forums when a decision has been made.
replies.body_tagged: Not yet, but it will be announced on the forums when a decision has been made.

replies.body:
The staff team has fully acknowledged the EULA and will be taking measures to make sure Avicus fits within their restrictions.

Stay updated on the forums to know what will be changing :D
